actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to preserve the rights of the United States as a mortgagee under title XI of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936.

summary.text: Amends Federal bankruptcy provisions to provide that the filing of a petition for bankruptcy shall operate as an automatic stay of the commencement or continuation of an action, by either the Secretary of Transportation or of Commerce, to foreclose a mortgage on a vessel under the Ship Mortgage Act, 1920.

titles.title: A bill to preserve the rights of the United States as a mortgagee under title XI of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936.
